name: Laura Unterguggenberger
summary: Software Engineering professional with a background in Computer Science and over 15 years of taking ownership of building first-class features and tools in engaging and collaborative Agile environments.

experience.title: Senior Engineer
bullets: Building new capabilities into the Golang logic service to be able to quickly generate pdfs and signed documents to increase the time to complete agent submissions.

Developed high-quality, scalable APIs using Golang and AWS.
Adding gRPC communication to increase type safety and ease of development accelerating services for large account partner integrations.

Mentoring and guiding junior engineers on technical direction, helping build project collateral, and influencing stakeholders.
Software Engineer

experience.title: Software Engineer
bullets:
Backend Golang developer building RESTful APIs on AWS focus for a personal fitness coaching app, focused on reducing the cognitive overhead for our fitness coaches, creating workflows to increase average client capacity including automating scheduling the initial strategy call, automating tasks reminding coaches of client completed workout-app goal tracking features.
Staff Software Engineer

experience.title: Staff Engineer

Understanding of Kubernetes to lead inception and planning with Pivotal's security partner integrations with PKS Pivotal ContainerService, now VMware Tanzu.
Exposer to modern Cloud Native applications: Istio service mesh and Helm Charts.
As part of the pioneering mandate of the Platform team, investigate ways to handling ingres and routing for Kubernetes
